mapper.insert: insert into myboard(board_num, board_title, board_content, id, nickname, profile_img) values(boardseq.nextval,#{board_title},#{board_content},#{id},#{nickname},#{profile_img})
mapper.select: select board_num, board_title, board_content, id, nickname, profile_img, write_date, board_cnt, board_recommend from (select rownum rnum, board_num, board_title, board_content, id, nickname, profile_img, write_date, board_cnt, board_recommend from (select * from myboard order by write_date desc)) where rnum >=#{pageStart} and rnum <=#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}-1
mapper.update: update myboard set board_cnt=board_cnt+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select * from myboard order by board_recommend
select * from myboard order by write_date desc

if.if: where board_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or board_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: select count(*) from myreply where board_num = #{board_num}
